## KeyValueRepository.ttl() method

Get ttl for an entry by key

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ttl?(key: string, options?: Options): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | Key for the entry |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<number>`

A promise of the TTL value
